LanguageData.StaggeredRaids.RaidSplitNotification: Raid Alert: The enemy has split their forces! Prepare for staggered waves of attacks. Stay sharp and hold the line!
LanguageData.StaggeredRaids.RaidWavesAlertDesc: Enemy forces are approaching in waves. Prepare your defenses for the next assault. Stay vigilant and repel the enemy's staggered assaults!
